dc_title_s: Shinsen sankō Tōkyō-shi ku kaisei zenzu; Sagano Hikotarō.
dc_description_s: Cover title. Title on map: Tōkyō zenzu. Publication date on map: Meiji 33 [1900]. Lithograph. In Japanese. Oriented with north to the right. Relief shown by hachures. Includes legend, address chart by ward (ku), recently incorporated villages by district (gun), and villages and jurisdictions of the Izu Shichito. Includes 3 inset historical maps of Edo and surrounding areas during the reign of the Ōgimachi Emperor (Eiroku era), Gomizunō Emperor (Kan'ei era), and Kōmei Emperor (Keiō era). Shows views of tourist attractions. 1 map: col.; 67 x 102 cm., folded in cover 27 x 19 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
